message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating away at our potential gains.
I'm willing to be fair, Alice. Let's split the money more evenly.  This offer is still in your favor, considering inflation will impact you more heavily than me.
Bob, it's clear you're feeling the inflation pinch more than I am. I'm willing to sweeten the deal slightly, but we need to settle this quickly. Time is money, after all.
